_sText:
After beating S.T.A.L.K.E.R. - Shadow of Chernobyl for the tenth time, I was left a devestated lonely man. Combine that feeling of emptiness with the inner feeling that I should actually do something constructive aside from just play games all damn day, and you get... The CS.T.A.L.K.E.R. series. This is the first of a collection of remakes of STALKER maps over to Counter Strike : Source. I needed something easy to get myself back into mapping, and even with a simple map as this I have learn a lot. MP_Pool is a hidden "bonus" map, that is unlocked by running the bpinstall.exe from your STALKER's game directory. You need to have two codes to unlock it. Personally, I think the map is 100% complete shit in STALKER. I figure it would be just perfect for CS:S though. After 12 days of work, I'm finally proud "really, I am; for the first time" to present to you this map. It doesn't exactly look anything like the true map, but that's because these games are run on two completely different engines. It's just highly inspired by the original. Enjoy. Big thanks to
Luntix, Duckster, Rootbeerz, jUSTIN, Sol!dSnake, Ravensong, Homizle!, littleD, Swifty, Kat_Fish, (and many more)!
